name: Bzz
description:
"Agent, the evil corporation W.A.S.P. have kidnapped our beloved Queen Spider, we must figure out where she is and get her back!

In order to do this, it is your task to infiltrate the enemy warehouses and plant BUGs to gain vital information on the Queen's whereabouts. Good luck Agent "

Gameplay:

Movement: WASD / Arrows 

Avoid the wasps or they will chase you

1. Get to the BUG placement point (marked X) and plant the BUG

2. Get to the exit  

Made for the GameOff2021 Month long game-jam, all of Bzz was created by CrazyMage_01 and TheConquerer_01.

Enjoy! Any and all feedback is welcome :)
